unicef-spe1.def: Proportion of women giving birth covered by maternity benefits: ratio of women receiving cash maternity benefits to women giving birth in the same year (estimated based on age-specific fertility rates published in the UN’s World Population Prospects or on the number of live births corrected for the share of twin and triplet births).
unicef-spe1.name: Mothers with newborns receiving cash benefit
unicef-spe1.source: ILO World Social Protection Report, 2017-2020. Last update: May 2021.
unicef-spe1.dataset: ILO World Social Protection Report, 2017-2020. Last update: May 2021.
